propertyDefinitions.name: FifoEnabled.06.info.dup.passthrough.enabled
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.fifotransactionreceivergroup.dup.msg.passthrough.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: e2net.msg.seq.generation.type
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.messagesequencegroup.msg.seq.generation.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: ChunkSize
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The size in bytes in which the message payload is broken into for transmission.

propertyDefinitions.name: CompressionSize
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The minimum size in bytes of message payloads before compression is used for transmission.

propertyDefinitions.name: RetryCount
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The number of times to retry for upload/download request.

propertyDefinitions.name: RetryInterval
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The sleeping interval (milliseconds) between each retry on upload/download request

propertyDefinitions.name: MaxThread
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The number of threads used for uploading and down loading messages.

propertyDefinitions.name: MonitoredClient
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Whether the B2B Client is to be monitored or not.

propertyDefinitions.name: ErrorDirectory
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The full path directory name where errored out files are moved to.

propertyDefinitions.name: UseDate
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Use a current date in the filename.  See DateFormat for the formatting.  The default is false.

propertyDefinitions.name: DateFormat
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The date format to use in the filenames if UseDate is set to true.  The default is a Java SimpleDateFormat of yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS.

propertyDefinitions.name: InboxFilenameFilter
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Obsolete. This is NOT used in B2BC protocol. Will be removed in the future.

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxFilenameFilter
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Simple Regular Expression to filter filenames to process in the outbox.  E.g. ^([^_]+)_([^_]+)_([^_]+)_([^_]+)_([^.]+)(\.txt|\.xls|\.xlsx)$

propertyDefinitions.name: InboxDirectory
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The full path directory name where inbound files are processed.

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxDirectory
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The full path directory name where outbound files are processed.

propertyDefinitions.name: ArchiveDirectory
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The directory path name of the location to which the system archives processed files.

propertyDefinitions.name: InboxStatusDirectory
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The full path directory name where inbound status files are located for this connection.

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxStatusDirectory
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The full path directory name where outbound status files are located for this connection.

propertyDefinitions.name: InboxFormat
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename format for inbox files. Values between the FilenameSeparators are set as DataSource properties within E2NA.

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxFormat
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename format for outbox files. Values between the FilenameSeparators are set as DataSource properties within E2NA.

propertyDefinitions.name: FilenameSeparator
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename separator used within the filename to denote separation between the DataSource properties within E2NA.  The default is _

propertyDefinitions.name: FilenameExtension
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename extension used at the end of files in the outbox and inbox.  The default is .txt

propertyDefinitions.name: InboxFilenameExtension
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename extension used at the end of files in the inbox. Supports using original file extension. E.g. ${fileExt:.txt}

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxFilenameExtension
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename extension used at the end of files in the outbox. Supports more than one extension. E.g. .txt|.xls|.zip

propertyDefinitions.name: AckSuccessExtension
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename extension used when acknowledging a successful processed file.  The default is .ack

propertyDefinitions.name: AckFailureExtension
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename extension used when acknowledging a failed processed file.  The default is .err

propertyDefinitions.name: KeepLogsFor
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The number of days to keep the b2bc logs.

propertyDefinitions.name: InProcessExtension
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename extension used when a file is currently being processed.  The default is .prc

propertyDefinitions.name: ZipFileEncodingCheck
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Explode a zip file into attachments on the inbound datasource

propertyDefinitions.name: InboxFilterClass
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: RESERVED FOR E2OPEN USE ONLY

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxFilterClass
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: RESERVED FOR E2OPEN USE ONLY

propertyDefinitions.name: InboxComparatorClass
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: RESERVED FOR E2OPEN USE ONLY

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxComparatorClass
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: RESERVED FOR E2OPEN USE ONLY

propertyDefinitions.name: FileEncoding
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Allowable values are: None, ConditionalZip and Zip.  Default is None.

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxSortFields
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Comma separated fields to use for sorting files in the outbox directory for upload. If not specified, defaults to the modification date of the files. Fields specified has to be present in the outbox file name format. Multiple fields may be specified by separating them with commas. Eg: timestamp

propertyDefinitions.name: DownloadDir
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Directory where files are temporarily spooled during download. The B2B Client requires 500mb of disk space to be available in this location for a successful installation.

propertyDefinitions.name: UploadDir
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Directory where temporary upload related status files are written into

propertyDefinitions.name: BackupAge
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Used with Backup Method, value in days to perform archive on files older than the specified days.

propertyDefinitions.name: BackupPolicy
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Select the file archiving mode. This will cause files in the inbox and the archive directories to be deleted or zipped and placed in a backup directory.  Specify the age of the files in the Backup Age property that should be used to determine which files to delete or zip.

propertyDefinitions.name: BackupDir
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Directory to backup inbox and archive files.

propertyDefinitions.name: InstallerIs64Bit
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Only supports 64 bit installations.

propertyDefinitions.name: InstallOptionalBundles
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Installs the specified optional bundles. E.g. ecc, apodp

propertyDefinitions.name: InboundHeaderAndLookupProps
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.inboundheaderandlookupprops.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboundHeaderAndLookupProps
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.outboundheaderandlookupprops.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: e2datahub_b2bc_company_id
propertyDefinitions.displayName: Destination Company ID (to route messages to)
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Destination Company ID (to route messages to)

propertyDefinitions.name: e2datahub_b2bc_base_dir
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Working directory

propertyDefinitions.name: e2datahub_b2bc_full_load_dir
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Directory to watch for full load files to be transferred

propertyDefinitions.name: e2datahub_b2bc_ecc_jco_connection_pool_size
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The size of the ECC JCo Connection Pool

propertyDefinitions.name: e2datahub_b2bc_apodp_cfcst_dir
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The directory to store received constrained forecast files

propertyDefinitions.name: TransportRetryInterval
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.transportretrygroup.transportretryinterval.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: TransportRetryLimit
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The number of times to retry due to not receiving a HTTP 200 response from trading partner web server.

propertyDefinitions.name: MessageRetryInterval
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.messageretrygroup.messageretryinterval.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: MessageRetryLimit
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.messageretrygroup.messageretrylimit.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: PartnerProfileDuns
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.messageprocessinggroup.partnerprofileduns.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: GatewayProfileDuns
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.messageprocessinggroup.gatewayprofileduns.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: Timezone
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.messageprocessinggroup.timezone.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: Charset
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.messageprocessinggroup.charset.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: MessageProcessing
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.messageprocessinggroup.messageprocessing.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: MessageParserClass
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.messageprocessinggroup.messageparserclass.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: VirusScanEnabled
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.messageprocessinggroup.virusscanenabled.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: IncompleteTransactionAlertIntervals
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.incompletetransactionalertgroup.incompletetransactionalertintervals.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: IncompleteTransactionTimeout
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.incompletetransactionalertgroup.incompletetransactiontimeout.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: FifoEnabled
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.fifotransactionreceivergroup.fifoenabled.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: FifoEnabled.06.info.dup.passthrough.enabled
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.fifotransactionreceivergroup.dup.msg.passthrough.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: e2net.msg.seq.generation.type
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.messagesequencegroup.msg.seq.generation.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: ChunkSize
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The size in bytes in which the message payload is broken into for transmission.

propertyDefinitions.name: CompressionSize
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The minimum size in bytes of message payloads before compression is used for transmission.

propertyDefinitions.name: RetryCount
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The number of times to retry for upload/download request.

propertyDefinitions.name: RetryInterval
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The sleeping interval (milliseconds) between each retry on upload/download request

propertyDefinitions.name: MaxThread
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The number of threads used for uploading and down loading messages.

propertyDefinitions.name: MonitoredClient
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Whether the B2B Client is to be monitored or not.

propertyDefinitions.name: ErrorDirectory
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The full path directory name where errored out files are moved to.

propertyDefinitions.name: UseDate
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Use a current date in the filename.  See DateFormat for the formatting.  The default is false.

propertyDefinitions.name: DateFormat
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The date format to use in the filenames if UseDate is set to true.  The default is a Java SimpleDateFormat of yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS.

propertyDefinitions.name: InboxFilenameFilter
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Obsolete. This is NOT used in B2BC protocol. Will be removed in the future.

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxFilenameFilter
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Simple Regular Expression to filter filenames to process in the outbox.  E.g. ^([^_]+)_([^_]+)_([^_]+)_([^_]+)_([^.]+)(\.txt|\.xls|\.xlsx)$

propertyDefinitions.name: InboxDirectory
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The full path directory name where inbound files are processed.

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxDirectory
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The full path directory name where outbound files are processed.

propertyDefinitions.name: ArchiveDirectory
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The directory path name of the location to which the system archives processed files.

propertyDefinitions.name: InboxStatusDirectory
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The full path directory name where inbound status files are located for this connection.

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxStatusDirectory
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The full path directory name where outbound status files are located for this connection.

propertyDefinitions.name: InboxFormat
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename format for inbox files. Values between the FilenameSeparators are set as DataSource properties within E2NA.

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxFormat
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename format for outbox files. Values between the FilenameSeparators are set as DataSource properties within E2NA.

propertyDefinitions.name: FilenameSeparator
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename separator used within the filename to denote separation between the DataSource properties within E2NA.  The default is _

propertyDefinitions.name: FilenameExtension
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename extension used at the end of files in the outbox and inbox.  The default is .txt

propertyDefinitions.name: InboxFilenameExtension
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename extension used at the end of files in the inbox. Supports using original file extension. E.g. ${fileExt:.txt}

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxFilenameExtension
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename extension used at the end of files in the outbox. Supports more than one extension. E.g. .txt|.xls|.zip

propertyDefinitions.name: AckSuccessExtension
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename extension used when acknowledging a successful processed file.  The default is .ack

propertyDefinitions.name: AckFailureExtension
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename extension used when acknowledging a failed processed file.  The default is .err

propertyDefinitions.name: KeepLogsFor
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The number of days to keep the b2bc logs.

propertyDefinitions.name: InProcessExtension
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The filename extension used when a file is currently being processed.  The default is .prc

propertyDefinitions.name: ZipFileEncodingCheck
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Explode a zip file into attachments on the inbound datasource

propertyDefinitions.name: InboxFilterClass
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: RESERVED FOR E2OPEN USE ONLY

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxFilterClass
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: RESERVED FOR E2OPEN USE ONLY

propertyDefinitions.name: InboxComparatorClass
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: RESERVED FOR E2OPEN USE ONLY

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxComparatorClass
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: RESERVED FOR E2OPEN USE ONLY

propertyDefinitions.name: FileEncoding
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Allowable values are: None, ConditionalZip and Zip.  Default is None.

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboxSortFields
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Comma separated fields to use for sorting files in the outbox directory for upload. If not specified, defaults to the modification date of the files. Fields specified has to be present in the outbox file name format. Multiple fields may be specified by separating them with commas. Eg: timestamp

propertyDefinitions.name: DownloadDir
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Directory where files are temporarily spooled during download. The B2B Client requires 500mb of disk space to be available in this location for a successful installation.

propertyDefinitions.name: UploadDir
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Directory where temporary upload related status files are written into

propertyDefinitions.name: BackupAge
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Used with Backup Method, value in days to perform archive on files older than the specified days.

propertyDefinitions.name: BackupPolicy
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Select the file archiving mode. This will cause files in the inbox and the archive directories to be deleted or zipped and placed in a backup directory.  Specify the age of the files in the Backup Age property that should be used to determine which files to delete or zip.

propertyDefinitions.name: BackupDir
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Directory to backup inbox and archive files.

propertyDefinitions.name: InstallerIs64Bit
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Only supports 64 bit installations.

propertyDefinitions.name: InstallOptionalBundles
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Installs the specified optional bundles. E.g. ecc, apodp

propertyDefinitions.name: InboundHeaderAndLookupProps
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.inboundheaderandlookupprops.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: OutboundHeaderAndLookupProps
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: protocol.outboundheaderandlookupprops.doc

propertyDefinitions.name: e2datahub_b2bc_company_id
propertyDefinitions.displayName: Destination Company ID (to route messages to)
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Destination Company ID (to route messages to)

propertyDefinitions.name: e2datahub_b2bc_base_dir
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Working directory

propertyDefinitions.name: e2datahub_b2bc_full_load_dir
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: Directory to watch for full load files to be transferred

propertyDefinitions.name: e2datahub_b2bc_ecc_jco_connection_pool_size
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The size of the ECC JCo Connection Pool

propertyDefinitions.name: e2datahub_b2bc_apodp_cfcst_dir
propertyDefinitions.displayDescription: The directory to store received constrained forecast files
